name: Contraption Simulator - Demo
description:
Build vehicles out of spare parts. Build anything out of rods, joints, wheels, wings, electric motors and rocket boosters.
The only limit is your imagination and your CPU.
Simulate your contraption. What can be assembled can be disassembled, so be careful, or don't!

There are two types of pre-built contraptions.

- Rocket Plane:

Use Space to activate the boosters. Use S to pitch upward and W to pitch downward. Keep the camera pointing in the direction you want to steer. Use A and D to roll.

- Car-t:

Use W to accelerate forward and S to decelerate and accelerate backwards. Use A and D to steer.

Inputs can be assigned for every motor and rocket booster. Inputs can also be changed from the settings view.

Known Issues:

- Rocket plume glitches.
- Performace drops,  mostly on Windows.
- Wheel friction is too low.
